title: 092: Dance Is The Global Language with Vandana Hart
itunes:title: 092: Dance Is The Global Language with Vandana Hart
description:
Have you watched the new Netflix docuseries, We Speak Dance? I’m OBSESSED and was connected with it’s host and producer, Vandana Hart. We ended up going to a dance hall class together and recording this episode!

In this interview we speak all about:
-How dance is the shared language of the learn
-The healing values of dance
-The cultural differences of dances around the world
-How Vandana created and pitched the show We Speak Dance to Netflix

If you’re a dance lover like me, you’ll adore this episode. Check out the show We Speak Dance on Netflix and connect with Vandana at @vandanahart on Instagram.

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
